ygData.msgSnippet: The fat lady has sung? Elvis leave the building? 8) *sigh* bored at work Minkin some good issues brought up, but some are kinda dumb, dancing mobs? WTF is
ygData.messageBody:
The fat lady has sung? Elvis leave the building? 8)

*sigh* bored at work

Minkin

some good issues brought up, but some are kinda dumb, dancing mobs? WTF is
this? why the hell that make the list, no way in hell that would get in,
they cant even make a drum animation, you expect a giant to dance? or a
drovlarg? or a golem? mind you I'd pay to see a female reverant dance...
waste of good space on the boards IMHO

Minkin
